programme.title: The Start of Me
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Super Fun Color Run
programme.desc: Sneevil tries to sabotage the Smighties annual Colour Festival by cementing the competing Smighties with his newest contraption. The Super Six must get colorfully creative to stop him.

programme.title: HYPNO-TACO
programme.desc: A new taco stand that has abruptly popped up overnight next to the tea shop. Strangely, though the tacos smell anything but tasty, the customers flock to it and Chai Raja sends Sundar to deal with matters. But that compounds the disaster as Sundar too turns his back at Chai Raja and starts guarding/waiting at the Taco stand with double his usual smartness! Though this gives Basha full freedom to raid the banana fries at the tea shop, Chai Rajas long face tugs at this heartstrings and Basha nips over to the taco stand to take a look at things. Thats when he realizes that the taco stand owner is in fact a rogue hypnotist from Bashas old circus who is literally hypnotizing the customers and Sundar to munch his Mexican lunch! Cracking his knuckles in glee, Basha sets about driving the rogue out of his mind and business. But a hypnotized Sunder is more powerful than ever, and Basha get whacked here and there in the ordeal. At last Basha gives a nice knock on Sundars head and he is back at the tea shop and Basha and Sundar together makes sure that the taco shop-owner runs for his dear life, much to Chai Rajas relief.

programme.title: HOLI RE HOLI!!!
programme.desc: It is holi and Basha is in the mood to have some colourful fun. He comes in style to hotel Kelifornia with gulaal and pichkaris and literally baths the customers in colours. Sundar is having a crazy time trying to save the customers. And in that process he literally turns into a colourful canine himself. But things take a shocking turn when Basha targets Chai Raja in his holi attack. A shock-stricken Sundar takes out all his non-existent bravado to save an oblivious Chai Raja and doing that Sundar himself unexpectedly falls onto Chai Raja bathing him in gulaal! When everyone stares in silent shock, Chai Raja surprises all by happily bathing Sundar in gulaal! And it is officially holi!!!

programme.title: The North Wind and the Sun
programme.desc: The North Wind and the Sun collide over whos stronger. They set a bet, to see who can make the passing traveler take off his jacket first.

programme.title: Game On
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Cuppa Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: HAI RE HIVE!
programme.desc: Chai Raja, right in the middle of the morning rush runs out of sugar and cant make more snacks. He orders Sundar to go get some but Sundar finds that the naughty Basha has stolen the tyres of the bicycle. If Sundar runs on foot, he will be too late and Chai Raja will lose customers. Thats when Sundar spots a beehive and gets a brainwave. Distracting the bees, he grabs the whole honeycomb and hands it over to Chai Raja. The snacks are super tasty , thanks to the honey and Chai Raja is pleased at Sundars quick thinking . Meanwhile the bees return and are mighty mad to find their hive gone. Basha, very generously points to honey paw marks leading to the hotel and the bees zone in on Sundar as the culprit. Basha gleefully points/uncovers Sundar each time he tries to hide.Basha literally becomes the commader of the bee army giving them all sorts of directions. Ultimate mayhem in the shop as Sundar finds out that sweet beginnings can have a very bitter and bee-bitten end.

programme.title: THE LILY OF THE EAST:
programme.desc: The Guardians take a welcome break from brainteasers to go fetch pollen from the Lily of the East, which only grows in one faraway cave. Everyone (including Negu) is convinced the flower’s pollen bestows magical powers. After an arduous journey through a bamboo forest and a series of caves, the Guardians reach the lily. But Koto and Amkko (who have been following in disguise) snatch the flower! By distracting the two mutants with riddles, the Guardians regain the precious flower and its pollen, which the Elders wanted…to flavor their tea!

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: Bun For The Road
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in a sprightly mood, his head zinging with ideas for a fresh menu but just as he is about to jot them on the blackboard, a throat clears behind him. Chai Raja turns to find a beaming salesman selling buns who wants Chai Raja to take a trial batch of his buns. Chai Raja doesnt much care for the pushy salesman from the start, but really loses his temper when the salesman implies that his buns are better than Chai Rajas fritters. An incensed Chai Raja orders Sundar to take care of the salesman so that he himself can get on with the days menu, as customers have started coming. Sundar immediately gets his guard face on and sends the salesman scuttling though little does he know that the stubborn guy has snuck back into the yard and is keeping an eye out for an opportunity to thrust his trial buns in Chai Rajas face. The salesman spots Basha neatly outwitting Sundar and decides to recruit the latter to worm his way into Chai Rajas presence- the salesman wants to prove his point and force Chai Raja to buy his buns. Basha expecting fritters as payment accepts and gets to work distracting Sundar. The salesman sneaks in and starts switching the snacks and soon Chai Raja faces foul-tempered customers who point at their plates in protest. Sundar is immediately summoned and given an earful- a confused Sundar suddenly spots the lurking salesman and realizes who the saboteur is. A chase ensues made hilarious by Bashas intervention that Chai Raja ends by landing a griddle splat on the salesmans hindquarters and sending him flying. Basha is left fritter-less but then spots the suitcase of buns that the salesman dropped

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: Rat Control
programme.desc: It looks like don has come to terms with Charly, Marly and Larry ; and that is not it, they are now friends!!! Colonel just cannot stand this atrocity. He is hiring experts after experts to destroy the rats. And at last the right person comes for the job. Will he succeed..?? You wish!!!!!!

programme.title: COMMANDO KAPPA
programme.desc: Chai Raja cycles in with a fresh batch of bananas when heavy army boots crunch in stomping at the door of the hotel. Chai Raja looks up and is not one jot happy to see his bossy estranged uncle Commando Kappa. Commando Kappa is a bossy man who wants to take over the hotel from Chai Raja and is zany enough to try any underhanded trick . Sundar senses this animosity and wants Kappa out of the shop but 6 and a half foot , Arnold like built Commando Kappa is a tough man to cross. Because he is no great cook, Kappa uses his army tactics to sabotage and tries messing up Chai Rajas ingredients- he switches the ingredients for the tea, Chai Raja knives suddenly go missing etc- Chai Raja however is quick at adapting and when knives go missing he merely uses his moustache to chop the bananas! Sunder too does his best to foil Kappa. and save Chai Raja- like when Kappa accidentally spills oil intending to slip up Chai Raja, Sundar rather himself skid in and break his own bones just so Chai Raja doesnt step into the oil or guzzle up all the chilli-spiced tea (thanks to Kappa dropping chilli powder into the brew on the sly) before Chai Raja serves it to customers and loses his reputation. However the curious Basha keeps poking his naughty nose in and its difficult for Sundar to keep up with Kappas ploys. Kappa tries to finally seize up the flexible Chai Raja, by offering a tampered herbal oil to limber him up (the oil actually stiffens whatever it is poured on- can demonstrate the effect when Kappa does a test on a small sapling on the sill). But just then Sundar and Basha tumble in as part of their chase and the oil flies landing on Kappa gets all seized up and stiff. The cricked Kappa gives up and is shown the door and Basha gives him a 21- banana peel sendoff. But Sundar has no time to rejoice for Basha is again sneaking up to the fries and must be stopped.

programme.title: Super Fireworks Show
programme.desc: Nardy celebrates the Light Region Light Show with edible fireworks, while Sneevil makes a volcano erupt with flowing lava, threatening all of the Smighties. Its up to the Super Six to use their powers and save the day.

programme.title: DEEP FRIED PRIDE
programme.desc: After discovering a powerful ancient mask that transforms him in to a (finally) formidable opponent, Mark turns on Durian and decides to pull rank

programme.title: Harvest Attack
programme.desc: Its harvest time and Dunky has given Cat the duty of protecting the fields with a sling and pebbles and Keet is to give him warnings if Hoodie the crow attacks the field with his gang

programme.title: The Tin Soldier
programme.desc: The brass soldier, GoGo who entered the playroom where the toys lived has no leg. A soldier who feels homogeneity with a ballerina who always stands with one leg up. But the soldier is caught up in a clown trap and falls out of the window.

programme.title: Planet Gadget
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Catch That Bird
programme.desc: Don has adopted a baby pigeon, but can he save it from 5 grumbling tummies? The three mice, Balu and Colonel are adamant on having baby pigeon pie and a mighty havoc ensues. But the kin & kith of the little pigeon have other plans and you have to watch to find out who ultimately ends up on the stove!

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: The Smighty Express
programme.desc: Creating Smighty Railroad, a secret way to the Smighty Stones, was a good idea, until the Villains found out. The Super Six must embark on a suspenseful and high-speed train race across all of Smightyland to stop Sneevil and Biggs in their locomotive from reaching the Stones first.

programme.title: TEA-PORIS
programme.desc: A gang of biker taporis come to hotel Kelifornia one day. They are such menacing baddies that they play all sorts of funny pranks with Sundar. Sundar being the sincere waiter takes it all until he is so sad that Sundar goes behind the hotel all sad and disappointed. Though Basha loves messing with Sundar, he cant take the bikers messing with Sundar. And our super smart Basha decides to give the bikers a heavier dose of their own medicine. What we see then is Basha in full Ranjikant style and adas punishing the rouge bikers in the most hilarious ways. And an excited Sundar doesnt forget to reward Basha generously with his favourite snacks. And in no time the tapori bikers flee for their dear lives.

programme.title: Ice cream Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: A Cold Crunch
programme.desc: It is freezing cold. Don is wrapped in a blanket when he notices a glow from the mouse’s hole. Wearing sunglasses and shorts, They have an orange coil burning right in the centre and its toasty and warm in there. Don has found a solution, he picks up the phone and orders for an electric blanket!

programme.title: Kites Away!
programme.desc: It all happens for a kite! Don wants it… the rats wont let it go. And in this tug of war, an angry and frustrated King Chomp is funnily pulled into. It is a bad time for the rats and a very bad time for Don and Colonel.

programme.title: The Gigantic Turnip
programme.desc: A gigantic turnip grows in the fields of the peasant GoGo grandpa. He tries to pull out an enormous, heavy turnip with the help of grandma, cats, and mice.

programme.title: 52 The Zoonigames
programme.desc: Pancake is disheartened when Odessa beats him at a game, but after playing a series of games in the Zooniverse, he learns there’s something even more important than winning-or-losing. Playing games is not about winning or losing but bout having fun!

programme.title: Trekker's Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is visiting his distant cousin in a remote area .the next day Dunky has woken up early and takes the sleepy parrot Keet and Cat for a morning trek to the mountains.

programme.title: Knight Racer
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: Panda-Monium
programme.desc: Maestro Woof needs the kind of bamboo that the Purple Panda eats so he can make a new flute, and he sends the Guardians to find some. Xia criticizes April’s skills as a pilot, so she decides to take the Lord of the Wind on a practice run while her friends look for the bamboo. When Xia and Pai are captured by a Mutant Purple Panda, April gets to show off her piloting prowess as she rescues them, and at the same time gathers the bamboo they need.

programme.title: Imagine Dragons
programme.desc: Maple learns the power of imagination when she imagines a dragon in the Zooniverse, and it goes out-of-control!. Learn to think things through.

programme.title: Bottle Cap
programme.desc: Small yet that doesnt stop our DIY geniuses from coming up with something fun

programme.title: The Lightning Strikes
programme.desc: Its raining heavily and the three are nicely tucked in the sofa and watching a tv show as the tv goes out.

programme.title: A new nose
programme.desc: The twins use a flashlight to solve a problem for a self-conscious little snowman.

programme.title: GOOD CROC, BAD CROC!
programme.desc: The Guardians enjoy a baby croc until it grows into an unmanageable mutant sent by Negu. They’ll need to train the croc, and then return it to the island Negu stole it from.

programme.title: Pool Off
programme.desc: Ever seen sharks in a swimming pool? The Rat-a-tat swimming pool has many such surprises including grenades, sharks and weights! Watch Colonel twist and turn to woo a hottie.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. With all the Doobydoos, he helps Tiggy by presenting him with an army of whiskers. Having the work all done, Deedee takes a bowl of lemon icing to pour into Mewmew’s rollerblade shoes, and it easily comes loose. All of the rescued and helped friends of Deedee muster up to find her magic wand. Charlie sleepily walks in scratching his back, complaining of something poking him all the time during his nap, which turned out to be Deedee’s wand! Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: Christmas
programme.desc: Its Christmas and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house with a Christmas tree, a small stable and stars, while Dunky is making a nice Christmas cake for the day.

programme.title: Tommy’s Got Talent
programme.desc: Charlie and the twins are practising for Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest. Deedee isn’t contesting as she didn’t get any time to practice. The twins have a tough time dancing in step with Uncle Charlie’s drum beat. Deedee tries to help them with a remembering spell, but Nino points out that it wouldn’t be fair to use magic in a contest. So Deedee and Nino walk along wishing the twins are able to perfect their act in time. Mewmew si struggling with a juggling act, so Deedee tries to help by conjuring a catching spell, but Nino reminds her it’s wrong just in time. Luciano haughtily sings as he walks. But Deedee and Nino hear an even more beautiful tune emanating from Tommy Prickles house. But Tommy is not too confident to sing in the presence of others. So Deedee comes up with a non-magic way to help. Happy at what Deedee suggests, Tommy decides to enroll. The fabulous prize is Tiggy’s very own specially made jelly. The winner is decided by who gets the highest ovation as measured on the clap-o-meter. Charlie and the twins perform outstandingly, so does Mewmew the juggling rabbit, Luciano’s opera all of whom get loud ovations. Finally it is Tommy prickles turn, but he isn’t able to keep his eyes closed like Deedee suggested him to, making his singing come to an abrupt stop. Deedee asks the audience if they could close their eyes to help Tommy sing. That was all Tommy needed to sing so very melodiously. The clap-o-meter does a full spin and points to the highest score ever. Tommy is declared the winner of Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest, that too without magic a wee bit.

programme.title: Fix it!
programme.desc: The twins visit a world where everything is falling apart, where they meet the frantic "fix-it team

programme.title: The dirtiest dinosaur
programme.desc: The twins learn the benefits of cleanliness when they encounter an ailing dinosaur.

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Task for the day: Building a plane. Spanners, bolts and wrenches fly in the air as Don gives instructions to Colonel on building a plane.

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who’s in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders’ absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is…whistle!

programme.title: Top Car
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: Plastic Spoon
programme.desc: Hepi and Briko reuse spoons to make some cute DIYs

programme.title: BE QUIET!
programme.desc: The Guardians travel to Anjing Island to retrieve Maestro Meow’s drum from the island’s ogre, who HATES noise of any kind. But the ogre steals Pai’s voice! Will he get it back in time to sing at tonight’s Good Luck Concert?

programme.title: The Magic Factory – Hansel & Gretel Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of HANSEL and GRETEL, having been called out by GRETEL. When they arrive, the detective discovers that it has been a year since the witch fell into the oven and the story ended happily. HANSEL and GRETEL’s lives are now happy and prosperous, thanks to the treasure they took from the WITCH. But then GRETEL bought a packet of cakes in which there was an invitation to visit the Magic Factory, a wonderful place full of promises and all kinds of sweet things. Despite his sister’s opposition, HANSEL went to the magic factory. But that was three days ago and HANSEL has still not returned. What mysteries are concealed within that magic factory?

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Gummy and his pals all head off camping, with comedy and disaster joining them every step of the way!

programme.title: Once Upon a Time Part 2
programme.desc: After accidentally landing Aladdin in jail, Jamillah comes up with a brilliant plan to break him out. Dressed as a guard, Jamillah approaches the cell and confidently tells the dozy guard that he is dismissed. Her confidence confuses him and she and Genie get Aladdin out. Aladdin cant believe he has a genie and races off shouting joyfully to all of Baghdad.

programme.title: Too Many Bubbles
programme.desc: When Pancake eats too many bubbles from the Bubble Pond, he becomes super bouncy. Too much of anything isnt good.

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: A Zoonicorn Followed Me Home
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t take a trip to visit her grandmother, a visit from the Zoonicorns inspires her to rediscover the wonderful things there are to do around her very own home. Appreciating that everyday things can be and are special.

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: I Cant Fall A sleep
programme.desc: Duda is hanging his Smoofy blanket to dry. Its been his good friend since he was a baby and he needs it to sleep every night. A strong wind blows Smoofy to Scots hideout and Scot decides to turn him into his cape. When Duda realizes that his Smoofy is gone, he becomes distraught and cannot fall asleep. The friends go butterfly exploring the next day; However, Dudas exhaustion from a restless night ruins his expedition. After discovering Dudas problem, the friends try to help him fall asleep. Soon, Scot shows up with a sleep-inducing invention, and inadvertently reunites Doubt with his precious Smoofy. But Scot wont give up Smoofy without a fight.

programme.title: Even More Difficult – The Beauty & The Best
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the tale of Beauty and the Beast, having been called out by BEAUTY. The BEAST has mysteriously disappeared, just when she had come to love him. The Detective and her assistant must find him before the magic rose in the garden loses its last petal.

programme.title: Too Cute
programme.desc: Biggs transforms himself into a cute baby animal to blend into Leilas Zoo. Now disguised, he can easily help Sneevil steal the Earth Stone. But all the sweet attention from Leila makes Biggs question his loyalty.

programme.title: Space-whale
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: A Storm in the Desert
programme.desc: A huge sand storm is approaching Baghdad. Everyone has been ordered to stay indoors and baton down the hatches. Jamillah arrives to find Aladdin boarding up windows and sealing the cracks in the door. Genie desperately doesnt want the storm to come, he hates getting sand in his lamp! Luckily he has an ancient and very complicated spell which will stop it but it requires a number of ingredients including a hens feather and a single drop of water. Jamillah and Aladdin go outside to collect the special items but Aladdin becomes stuck under a cart. Genie and Jamillah have to work quickly to stop the storm and save Aladdin.

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: Super Fun Color Run
programme.desc: Sneevil tries to sabotage the Smighties annual Colour Festival by cementing the competing Smighties with his newest contraption. The Super Six must get colorfully creative to stop him.

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: The Cup Final – Snow Queen
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the SNOW QUEEN, by Hans Christian Andersen, having been called out by GERDA, a young girl, whose best friend, KAY, has been whisked off by a white sleigh, driven by an enigmatic woman dressed in white furs. She is the SNOW QUEEN, who has taken KAY to her palace at the North Pole. After a kiss from the SNOW QUEEN, the boy has lost all his memories and is now a prisoner in the palace of ice. SANDRA and FO will have to find him and rescue him from the powerful Lady of Winter.

programme.title: The Forbbiden Room – Bluebeard
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the mysterious story of BLUEBEARD, having been called out by two MUSKETEERS, the brothers of MARIE, BLUEBEARD’s latest wife. The brothers have to leave on an urgent mission and they cannot visit their newly-married sister. The MUSKETEERS ask SANDRA to investigate their brother-in-law, as they do not trust him. After the MUSKETEERS have left, SANDRA realises the true magnitude of the problem. In the story, it is the MUSKETEERS who save MARIE, just when BLUEBEARD is about to finish her off. If SANDRA and FO do not intervene immediately, MARIÉ will be a goner.

programme.title: Where’s Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Shopping Mad
programme.desc: Its shopping time! Don and Colonel move the trolley up the aisles, little do they know that the three mice are peeping from between Don’s bag. Chaos unfolds in the mall!

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: I want To Ride The Sled
programme.desc: Duda visits Scot who is busy with his snow sleigh. Duda wants to take a ride on the sleigh but Scot refuses to share. So Duda makes his own sled and takes it on his next expedition with Dada, Caber, and Bubble. However, due to Dudas antics, Pinkar crashes and they end up stranded in a hot desert with a flat tire and an empty gas tank. Back in the Unknown Forest, Piggy, Puggy and Scot decide to go after them so Scot can show off his awesome sleigh. Meanwhile, Duda and his friends take turns riding his sleigh. After watching Duda ride his sleigh in the sand, Dada gets the idea and needs nothing more than Scots help to get home. Will the friends be able to escape the desert safely?

programme.title: Water Of Life – Shoemaker & The Elves
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO are called out by a SHOEMAKER, from the story of the “Elves and the Shoemaker”, by the Brothers Grimm. The elves have gone mad and have extraordinary strength; they have destroyed the SHOEMAKER’s workshop and the town hall. Then, they went into the town arsenal and are about to set light to all the gunpowder. The entire town is in danger. SANDRA and FO will have to unravel the mystery of the elves’ madness and find the Water of Life, the only antidote to turn the dangerous elves back into their usual affable, hard-working selves.

programme.title: Rayito de luz
programme.desc: Cuando Mary se entera de que Caleb tiene otra mujer, se escapa con su pequeño hijo Rayito.

programme.title: Rayito de luz
programme.desc: Cuando Mary se entera de que Caleb tiene otra mujer, se escapa con su pequeño hijo Rayito.

programme.title: La belleza del amor
programme.desc: Emma tiene una exitosa web de estilo de vida, cuando sus vistas bajan, le toca asociarse con una millennial.

programme.title: Un respiro es suficiente
programme.desc: Yamán y Nefés son polos opuestos: él quiere quitarse la vida, ella ama vivir, pero tiene los días contados.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.desc: The show explores historical epochs and phases that marked economic, social, and political turning points for countries in the Arab region and the world.

programme.title: Political Memory
programme.desc: Former Minister of Foreign Affairs of Sudan, Lam Akol, talks about the Sudan People’s Liberation Movement, its establishment and the countries supporting it.

programme.title: First Class
programme.desc: Get to know how the Arab world’s first-class financial and business leaders made it to the top. These are the challenges they faced, the strategies they continue to apply and the visions that motivate them.

programme.title: Hadi Badi
programme.desc: Director: Hassan El Sifi - Cast: Farid Shawki / Noura - Year of production: 1984

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Ride Him, Bosko -1931
programme.desc: BosKo in the Wild West, tries to have fun with any situation that come in his way.

programme.title: Now Hear This 1962
programme.desc: In this very abstract cartoon, a hard-of-hearing old Britisher finds a red horn and uses it as a megaphone, unaware that it is really a lost horn from the Devil's forehead. The Britisher finds that the horn has the effect of amplifying every sound psychedelically and causing him serious bodily harm

programme.title: Training Pigeons 1936
programme.desc: Betty Boop is training a flock of pigeons, but one stray leads Pudgy the pup on a precarious chase over the rooftops.

programme.title: The Mechanical Monsters 1941
programme.desc: Superman battles a criminal mastermind and his robot army.

programme.title: Out to Punch 1956
programme.desc: Popeye's training for his boxing match with Bluto by jumping rope with a massive chain. Bluto, who's lazy about everything except sabotage, decides he needs to stop Popeye. He fills Popeye's heavy bag with iron junk, but Popeye punches it over the fence onto Bluto. Next, he pulls on the springs attached to the wall with a motorcycle, but Popeye pulls so hard he throws Bluto and the cycle through the building and into a well. Popeye is walking -- or actually, prancing -- behind Olive on the way to the match, so Bluto tries a bit more sabotage: first an oil slick, which slows Popeye down briefly, then some quick-dry cement in a puddle. This gives Popeye cement overshoes, and when he gets to the arena, he's exhausted. Olive stands him up, but Bluto treats him like a punching bag. He's got Popeye on the floor (under the ring), so Olive finally breaks out the spinach. Popeye knocks Bluto through the roof, right into the hospital. The photographers ask for a picture, and Popeye's biceps form the words "THE END."

programme.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves.

programme.title: Cookin' with Gags 1955
programme.desc: The boys are taking Olive on a picnic. It's April 1, and Bluto plays a series of "jokes" on Popeye, though of course they go beyond the bounds of acceptability, particularly once they get to the picnic grounds; Bluto puts gasoline on the fire he asks Popeye to light and swaps a beehive for the lemonade. Bluto then launches a cruel joke against Olive and frames Popeye. The capper: he replaces Popeye's spinach with a joke can, and runs off with Olive for some canoeing. But Popeye gets the last laugh with an inflatable sea monster.

programme.title: The Song of the Birds-1935
programme.desc: The Song of the Birds-1935

programme.title: Felix Goes A-Hunting-1923
programme.desc: A wife throws her husband out of the house, telling him not to return unless he brings her a fur coat. Deciding that the only way he'll get one is to make his own, he grabs his rifle and goes hunting. All his efforts fail, though, until he meets Felix, who offers to help him shoot rabbits, and impresses the man with his marksmanship skills. However, it turns out that shooting the rabbits isn't quite as easy as they thought it would be.

programme.title: Floor Flusher 1954
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto stop by to see Olive and fix her leaky faucet. Popeye does it better, and Bluto gets jealous, so he starts rerouting Olive's plumbing and causing all sorts of leaks. Popeye needs some help from the goldfish to get to his spinach

programme.title: Superman: The Magnetic Telescope- 1942
programme.desc: When police interfere with a reckless scientist's experiment, it creates a deadly meteor shower only Superman can stop.

programme.title: Baby Buggy Bunny 1954
programme.desc: Baby-faced Finster robs a bank, but the baby carriage with the money in it goes down Bugs' rabbit hole.

programme.title: Felix in the Bone Age-1922
programme.desc: Felix comes upon a caveman and his girlfriend. The girlfriend is crying, and when the caveman asks her what she wants, she points to Felix. The caveman chases Felix, who escapes by using the tails of some friendly monkeys to make his way down a steep cliff. Later he makes friends with a baby monkey, but winds up getting in a fight with a huge gorilla.

programme.title: Gripes-1943
programme.desc: Private Snafu learns the hard way about the need for military dicipline and procedures to maintain an effective army.

programme.title: Assault and Flattery 1956
programme.desc: Bluto is accusing Popeye in judge Wimpy's courtroom. Bluto tells a sad tale of how Popeye attacked him without provocation, but Popeye tells his side, in detail (in other words, a large chunk of _Balmy Swami, A (1949)_)

programme.title: Plane Dumb-1932
programme.desc: After crash landing in Africa, Tom and Jerry masquerade as Africans in a futile attempt to adapt to a strange environment.

programme.title: Space Transformer 1985
programme.desc: Using new technology, a crew consisting of Captain Chi, Nancy, and the robots Baipam and Diatron 5, is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into Ivy's body in order to defeat the invaders. Enlisting benevolent beings found inside Ivy's body, the crew prepares for an inner space battle that can decide the fate of the world.

programme.title: Speak Easily 1932
programme.desc: A timid professor inherits a large sum of money and decides to fund a terrible musical.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show 1962: Season 2; Episode 4; Bank Book 6565696
programme.desc: Rob discovers Laura's secret bank account. Its mystery preoccupies his thoughts till he finally has to confront her and ask what it's for.

programme.title: The Little Princess 1939
programme.desc: A little girl is left by her father in an exclusive seminary for girls, when her father fights in the Second Boer War. Later, when he is presumed dead she is forced to become a servant.

programme.title: Between Showers-1914
programme.desc: Charlie and another man compete in trying to help a young lady cross a muddy street. The rival finds a wooden plank which Charlie takes from him. They fight over an umbrella belonging to the rival. A policeman settles the dispute, ultimately arresting the rival. An innocent tramp is pushed into the lake

programme.title: Hop to It, Bellhop 1919
programme.desc: Two hotel bell hops get into all kinds of shenanigans between dames, baths and bags of loot.

programme.title: Balloonatic 1923
programme.desc: A hapless amusement park attendant finds his run away balloon ride has left him in a strange predicament

programme.desc: Based on a Corrido by Gerardo Ortiz and Jorge Santa Cruz, a band of violent criminals lead by La Bestia try to take over Tijuana under their bloodthirsty domain, but the people is ready to face them off.

programme.title: Rust
programme.desc: Best friends heather and morgan meet up with some friends at an abandoned attraction. What they dont know is within the house lives a cannibalistic madman. They soon find themselves fighting to survive. They are now being hunted down by non other than the blood wrenching and unmerciful grasp of Travis McLennan.

programme.title: Rust 2
programme.desc: After the horrific ordeal and the loss of her friends, Heather is forced to return to Hotel Fear where Travis prepares for his next victims, Heather must fight once again.

programme.title: Plantados
programme.desc: When Ramon discovers that Mauricio, one of the cruelest prison guards he remembers from being incarcerated in Cuba, lives in Florida, he begins to recall various traumatic instances experienced with his torturer. Along with two sons of others ex "plantados", Ramon kidnaps Mauricio and forces him to face the many cruelties he delivered.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar enthusiast John to review the Jamie Garcia Reserva Special cigar. Together, they discuss its rich, full-bodied flavors, perfect burn, and overall experience, offering their takes on what makes this cigar a must-try for connoisseurs.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Tucked away on 22 St at the heart of Ybor City, The Cabrera family opened a boutique Cigar shop in 2014. Ten years later, owner Vladimir Cabrera reflects on his personal journey and family business while showcasing a vast selection of premium cigars from around the world. Tune in to discover why Tampero Cigars is a straight cut above the rest!

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Sean welcomes Michael Denys from the renowned Plasencia Cigars. Join them as they delve into the rich history and innovative spirit of the Plasencia family, exploring their diverse tobacco farms and the meticulous blending process that defines their acclaimed cigars. Get an insider's perspective on what makes Plasencia a true titan in the industry.

programme.title: Privada Cigar Club
programme.desc: We finally figured out what makes cigar ash color. Grey Ash, White Ash, there is a one word answer we have all been wondering about and here it is!

programme.title: The Cigar Guys Podcast

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow

programme.title: Confessions Of A Time Traveler The Man From 3036
Guest Chris Spencer
programme.desc: Chris Spencer is a longtime comedian who makes me laugh so hard every time I see him. He’s got a new doc on Vice called Black Comedy In America.

programme.title: Guests Diamond, Abenaa Quiin, K.H.A.R.I.S.
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Diamond, Abenaa Quiin, K.H.A.R.I.S. who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: Guest Joshua Rothman
programme.desc: Slavery is America's dirty little secret, which is why there's so many misconceptions and misinformation that's in history books and circling around society today. The hierarchy of slavery, the business that it took to make it work and become successful, and the slave societies that thrived as a result of it are all not often talked about. Listen in to a fascinating conversation with Joshua Rothman, author and professor at the University of Alabama, that starts with the origins of slavery, to the ships, and then to the plantation. Regardless of which part you look at, a slave trader was involved every step of the way.

programme.title: The Wicked Kitchen-3 Mind Bending Mushrooms to Cook With
programme.desc: Three amazing mushrooms and the techniques used to cook them.

programme.title: The Voting Bloc
programme.desc: Kaporos is a highly controversial religious practice that involves the slaughter of chickens.

programme.title: Animal House!
programme.desc: Watch heroes work with overcrowded, underfunded animal shelters in this uplifting, series!

programme.title: Luscious Lasagna with The Spicy Vegans
programme.desc: Get your spice on with this flavor explosion!

programme.title: Best vegan chocolate cake... in Ireland!
programme.desc: When 2 vegan rock stars visit Ireland... they learn, how to make the best vegan chocolate cake!

programme.title: One woman's journey to powerhouse influencer!
programme.desc: Victoria Moran reveals her journey to becoming a best-selling author and powerhouse influencer!

programme.title: John Robb
programme.desc: John Robb has done it all... singer, bassist, TedX talker, best-selling author, TV host and vegan.

programme.title: Susan's Vegan Soy Curl Bolognese
programme.desc: Extraordinary, meaty Bolognese with all the rich flavor but no cholesterol

programme.title: Demon Baby
programme.desc: A young couple looking to rekindle a damaged relationship retreat to the remote Scottish Highlands. They are haunted by their past, their surroundings and each other.

programme.title: The Last Nosferatu
programme.desc: Ethan has been single for several months and decides to meet people via the Internet. One night, he dates “Black Pearl” whom he literally falls in love with, but she disappears, so he decides to go looking for her. One evening, Black Pearl resurfaces and seems to be hiding a mysterious secret that will lead him to a tragic fate...

programme.title: Angel
programme.desc: After his daughter goes missing, a wealthy contractor hires a group of investigative journalists to probe into an abandoned town with hope of uncovering clues about her disappearance...

programme.title: Early Grave
programme.desc: On the eve of their ten year high school reunion, six people are summoned to the isolated country estate of one of their former friends, now a famous horror writer. Once there, separated by guilt, yet bound together by a terrible secret, seven adults try to reconnect with each other, and take stock of their lives. Outside, the storm clouds gather. Rain, lightning and wind isolate the house by washing out the road and knocking down the power lines. And then, they begin to be brutally murdered one by one. Someone is out there in the wind and the rain, someone who has waited for ten years to wreak a terrible vengeance on this group. Seven friends find themselves in a struggle to survive and outwit a diabolical killer who is savagely committed to sending them all to an EARLY GRAVE...

programme.title: Hotel Dinosaurio
programme.desc: Sienna está desesperada por ganar un gran premio en metálico en un concurso secreto clandestino, pero los dinosaurios comienzan a cazarla para entretenimiento de los ricos y adinerados. ¿Podrá ser la última en sobrevivir a la horrible noche para ganar el premio?

programme.title: Kecksburg
programme.desc: Un reportero investiga un misterioso accidente y descubre algo más que un objeto, sino una enorme conspiración gubernamental. Inspirada en los hechos reales del 9 de diciembre de 1965 y en uno de los incidentes OVNI más misteriosos de Estados Unidos...

programme.title: El Culto de Humpty Dumpty
programme.desc: Un grupo de adolescentes con problemas y su maestra deben luchar por sobrevivir después de descubrir que una secta ha devuelto la vida a Humpty Dumpty, un muñeco asesino, y lo ha liberado en el campamento en el que se encuentran...

programme.title: El Basukazo 2
programme.desc: Después de haber sido dado por muerto, Edgar es rescatado por una bella mujer que trabaja en la mafia, cuando Edgar se recupera de sus heridas se integra al nuevo equipo ya que se necesita un hombre que sea experto en el manejo de las armas.

programme.title: Arareko Amor y Odio
programme.desc: Cuando fueron jóvenes no pudieron realizar su amor, ahora sus hijos vuelven a enamorarse. pero las envidias desatan el odio y la muerte en este bello pueblo llamado Estación Creel.

programme.title: 6 Impactos
programme.desc: John Solís interpreta al pulpo, un traficante que vive el infierno de tener a su hijo muy enfermo y necesita una operación de vida o muerte. Así que el pulpo tendrá que hacer hasta lo imposible para juntar el dinero que necesita para dicha operación.

programme.title: Eros Una Vez María
programme.desc: María es el gran amor de Tonatiuh, pero él la pierde. Intenta mantener su esencia, buscando incansablemente en cada mujer que conoce, tratando de obtener tantas experiencias sobre ellas como pueda, para poder encontrar algo que le recuerde a su amor perdido. Todas esas mujeres tienen una particularidad: se llaman María.

programme.title: Gritos del Monday
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de Ingeniería Ambiental realizan un trabajo en la Reserva Ecológica de los Saltos del Monday, conocido por su rica fauna y su rica historia. Para el trabajo, los alumnos deciden acampar en el lugar, en medio de la obscura noche son sorprendidos por un hecho que desencadenará a lo largo de sus días posteriores, en especial a una de las estudiantes.

programme.title: Choele
programme.desc: Todo ocurre en el pueblo de Choele Choel, provincia de Río Negro. Un niño y su padre intentan seguir juntos todo el verano, pero el chico ya decidió partir hacia otro lugar con su madre, cuando ésta llegue y le recoja. A la zona donde viven llega una chica, por la que comienzan a competir padre e hijo.

programme.title: El Beso Inmortal: La Reina De La Noche
programme.desc: Las vacaciones italianas de dos universitarias chocan con un antiguo ritual. Pero a veces los rezos se convierten en cazadores.

programme.title: La Llorona Siempre Vuelve
programme.desc: Una familia decide tomar unas vacaciones para olvidar la tragedia que habían vivido, sin imaginar que la maldición aún los alcanzaba.

programme.title: La Peste (Renaceremos de Nuestras Cenizas)
programme.desc: En un pueblito en donde reinaba la paz y tranquilidad un día inesperado sin saber cómo ni de donde cayó “La Peste” hundiendo a sus habitantes en la desolación y en la desesperanza, pero en medio de esa oscuridad surgirá un pequeño grupo de personas que ayudará a combatirla y a detenerla para siempre.

programme.title: Cover The Spread
programme.desc: When the odds are against you, face the battle anyway. In “Cover The Spread,” Pastor Steven Furtick challenges us to turn our problems into petitions — because God’s got the answer.

programme.title: Running For A Reason
programme.desc: Our expectation of God must not be that there will never be anything chasing us in life but that we are chosen while we are chased. In “Running For A Reason,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that even though God has placed something significant in us, certain development can only happen in the caves of our lives.

programme.title: Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief
programme.desc: The belief that we need something other than God is what keeps us from going through breakthroughs. That’s how we can be in covenant with God but still in captivity. In “Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us break up with what’s been holding us back.

programme.title: Rescue Your Testimony
programme.desc: Pastor Steven Furtick helps us deal with disappointment and revive our hope in “Rescue Your Testimony.” You’ll be encouraged to tell your story through the lens of God’s faithfulness.
